title: Analytics Dashboard
lede: Monitor performance metrics and gain insights into your AI calling operations.

sections.title: Dashboard Overview
sections.content:
Get a comprehensive view of your calling performance with real-time analytics.

Key Metrics:

  • Call Volume: Total calls made and received
  • Success Rates: Conversion and completion percentages
  • Agent Performance: Individual agent statistics
  • Cost Analysis: Spending breakdown by service

sections.title: Custom Dashboards
sections.content:
Create personalized dashboards with the metrics that matter most to you.

  • Widget Library: Choose from various chart types
  • Time Ranges: Customize date ranges for analysis
  • Filters: Drill down into specific data segments
  • Export Options: Share dashboards and data
